summary: Breton follower found at the winking skeever in solitude.  (essential)
descriptionHtml:
Hello fellas

This is my follower i use that i made a few months ago. I dont really play anymore on account of other games, but i thought i would release it on the nexus in case someone would like to use it

Requirments:

None. This mod is standalone and does not rely on any others.


Installation:

Drop the Textures and meshes folders and the .esp into your data folder. When asked to merge, say yes.
Open Nexus mod manager, check off Eva.esp
...Then lick the salt, and bite the lime...in that order (very important)


FAQ:
What race is she?
She is a breton.
(sultry voice)

What body does she use?
Which ever one you have installed for the npc\'s and yourself.

What is in her inventory?
Some unique solitude guard armor, unique steel plate boots, and an unique katana.

Does she level with you?
Yes

What are her skills?
She has a very special set of skills...

Can she die?
No - she will cower and go unconscious


How do get her to change clothes to something less protective than her armor?

Like all default scripted followers, you will need ultimate follower overhaul, or a really high pickpocket skill.
If you are using U.F.O, (which everyone should cuz its awesome), ask her to dress better, then her worn clothing will show up in her inventory.

U.F.O. - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037

Lore:
For those of you that enjoy the lore, she is a breton not far from the border with High Rock there in Solitude, safe with the imperials, and has her own solitude guard armor where she has been in employ for the past while.

...and did i mention she likes long walks on the beach, jane austen novels, the spice girls, ticklefights, and she thinks Ryan Gosling is \"like so dreamy.\".

Location:
You can find her having a drink at the winking skeever in solitude. Its the first building on your left when you enter the gates.

Load order: (if you are using ultimate follower overhaul:)

Skyrim.esm
UltimateFollowerOverhaul.esp
Eva.esp

Credits:

Apachii for letting me use Her ApachiiSkyHair #21 - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

MAKO7 for use of the CBBE3m Solitude guard armor and plate boots - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13004

Recommendations (mods i like):

TBBP from CB++ - available on *elsewhere* - If you\'re into the body stuff, this is #1

Pretty Combat Idles - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15703

The Dance of Death - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10906

Levelers Tower - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14152


Conflicts:

None.

Tools used:

Creation Kit

7Zip

Fallout Mod Manager (TES Snip)

Skyrim NPC editor



Visuals used in the screenshots:

Sharpshooters ENB - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15105

Better females by Bella (makeup version 2) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812

Where i found the information to make this mod:

http://www.creationkit.com/

http://uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Skyrim

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AlepT3rQ8LI
author: PowderdToastMan
